quiver
Class QPoint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--quiver.QItem
        |
        +--quiver.QPoint
public class QPoint
extends QItem

points (vertices) in a quiver. The term 'point' is reserved for this type of point.

Field Summary

          the label character for the point

labelRectangle

protected Rectangle labelRectangle(Graphics2D g)
returns rectangle containing label character. This is for positioning the label, and adjusting arrows so they don't collide with labels.
Parameters:
g - a graphics context from which font metrics are obtained
Returns:
the rectangle containing the label character

labelOffset

public int labelOffset(Graphics2D g,
                       int x,
                       int y)
offset for endpoints of arrows. Determines whether (x, y) lies within label rectangle, and if so, returns an appropriate offset to move it outside the rectangle.
Parameters:
x - x coordinate of point being tested
y - y coordinate of point being tested
Returns:
the offest amount
